titles: The counsell of a father to his sonne, in ten seuerall precepts left as a legacy at his death.
author: Burghley, William Cecil, Baron, 1520-1598.
publisher: Printed for Iosepth [sic] Hunt, and are to be sold at his shop in Bedlem, neere Moore-field gate,
notes: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Conduct of life --  Early works to 1800.
